item.description:
It's Plunk's Birthday and every year we celebrate it by doing something special with her.

Plunk has grown quite fond of Riverside Park in Raymond....mainly because she can run around off leash like all the "big" dogs. So Raymond it is !!!

We'll probably start with a walk on the trails then head over to the enclosed park so Plunk and her pals can run around and have fun. Then we'll have the official birthday celebration with Cake and Frosty Paws !!!

Plunk would love it if her pals could join in with the festivities.
item.how_to_find_us: Plunk will be the beagle wearing the birthday hat and screaming

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Plunk's Birthday Bash
